entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 23. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
